!Master Shubain You say that Master Gwain sent you? You must be taking the test to become a Dragoon. The best measures your bravery and strength, both of which are vital for a great Dragoon. But no matter how brave or strong a young warrior may be, he often fails the test because he is nervous or afraid. He may do well during practice, but when it's time for the real thing, he realizes that he is not yet ready. Only those who don't tremble before any foe will be able to pass the test. So...
